page.title: 15A Day in the Life of Karen
page.content: On July 6th I got up at 8.00am and had my breakfast. Then at 9.00am we went into Chichester. I bought myself a pair of pink shoes to match my best dress and my sister got a pair of school sandals which my dad paid for. After that we went to get an ice cream but the shop had run out, so we went back 10 minutes later and had one. Then we went to get some Pork Fillet for dinner ,which we barbecued when we got home. We had srawberries and cream for pudding as it was my mum and dad's Wedding Anniversary. In the afternoon Juile and I used some canes to make a tent, a water carrier and a clothes prop . At teatime we had corned beef and choux buns . Then I went to bed at 9.00pm.
